name: SObjectAccessDecision

methods.name: getModifiedIndexes
methods.description: Returns the indexes of sObjects that are modified by the stripInaccessible method.

methods.name: getRecords
methods.description: Returns a list of new sObjects that are identical to the source records, except that they are stripped of fields that fail the field-level security check for the current user.

methods.name: getRemovedFields
methods.description: Returns a map of sObject types to their corresponding inaccessible fields. The map key is a string representation of the sObject type. The map value is a set of strings, which denote the fields names that are inaccessible.

description: Contains the results of a call to the Security.stripInaccessible method and methods to retrieve those results.
